name: Time of issuance
text:
PART II.  EXECUTION

     Execution and alias executions upon any judgment or decree of a court for the payment of money, may be issued at any time during the life of the judgment or decree. [CC 1859, §1031; am L 1919, c 42, §1; RL 1925, §2436; am L 1929, c 81, §1; RL 1935, §4135; RL 1945, §10162; RL 1955, §233-30; HRS ; am L 1970, c 188, §39]
